Windlord::

"That's ok... Now be a good girl and follow Nighlight"said the Male

Nighlgiht smiled and with one arm had Elita and she ofered the other 
in order to Cam took it "Hi I'm Nighlight, she's my daughter, Elita"

Elita giggled and she recongzed Cam and with a wide smile she spread 
her little arms to cam "Am, Am.." said among giggles the baby who 
was in robot mode
